name: Raymond WILLIAMS, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Williams v. Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County

parties: Raymond WILLIAMS, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent it seeks mandamus relief. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to dispose of Petitioner’s pending petition within 90 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1287
Raymond WILLIAMS, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 123 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 2, 2015.
